title: Stephen Miller and Kristi Noem directive demands 3,000 daily ICE arrests
summary: Deputy White House Chief of Staff Stephen Miller and DHS Secretary Kristi Noem issued a directive to ICE to arrest up to 3,000 immigrants each day - a more than fourfold increase from the previous daily average. This unprecedented quota system for immigration arrests represents a fundamental shift in enforcement priorities toward quantity over targeted enforcement.
